name: Wedding Peach
overview: Wedding Peach is a multiplayer party game that involves playing mini-games and earning the highest score after a set number. The game characters from Wedding Peach, a Sukehiro Tomita shoujo manga that features three highschool girls - Momoko, Yuri and Hinagiku - that learn that they're magical angels. Their duties to protect the humans from devils sometimes interferes with their school lives, which often involves trying to catch the attention of their mutual crush Kazuya Yanagiba. The game begins with the three arguing about being the one to take Kazuya to a school dance, and decide to have a competition to determine which of them will ask him. The game features eight mini-games. Players can choose to play a single mini-game of their choice, or they can play the story mode which logs the player's score across several days of randomly selected mini-games.
